437 
WGUS83 KIND 101138
FLSIND
FLOOD STATEMENT
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE INDIANAPOLIS IN
638 AM EST WED DEC 10 2014

......The Flood Warning is no longer in effect for portions of the
following river in Indiana...

  White River...


.The White River in the Edwardsport area has fallen below flood stage
in southwest Indiana.

Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Be alert to flood debris on previously flooded roads. Keep children 
away from flooded areas. Recreational and agricultural interests 
should remain alert to changing river conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web. From
the blue menu bar on the left side of the page...click on rivers and 
lakes.



INC027-051-083-125-101208-
/O.CAN.KIND.FL.W.0215.000000T0000Z-141211T0000Z/
/FREI3.1.ER.000000T0000Z.141208T1200Z.000000T0000Z.NO/
638 AM EST WED DEC 10 2014

The Flood Warning is cancelled for
  The White River at Edwardsport.
* At  5:30 AM Wednesday the stage was 14.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will fall to 12.8 feet by sunset.
